ygData.subject: Wizard spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I am on the look out for the Root spell my friends of Norrath.  I have travel far from Erudin in my search yet have been unable to locate it.  I have gone as
ygData.messageBody:
I am on the look out for the Root spell my friends of Norrath. I have travel
far from Erudin in my search yet have been unable to locate it. I have gone as
far a Rivervale looking for this spell of great legacy. Does anybody know of
its whereabouts? It would be greatly appreciated if any creature could let me
know.

Zakrul the Traveler
Companion
Erudite Wizard

-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://web.horde.org/imp/
